info.title: Food Standards Agency API
info.description: The FSA Food Alerts API provides access to current and recent Food Alerts: Allergy Alerts (AA), Product Recall Information Notices (PRIN) and Food Alerts for Action (FAFA). It provides applications with the facility to list alerts matching some filter criterion, and to retrieve a description of an alert.

get.summary: Returns details of all authorities, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of authorities (id/name), details can be retrieved by calling authorities/{id}, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of authorities (id/name), details can be retrieved by calling authorities/{id}, results are unbound.
Returns details of all authorities, results are unbound.
Returns details of a single authority, selected by Id.
Returns details of all business types, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of business types, details can be retrieved by calling countries/{id}, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of business types, results are unbound.
Returns details of all business types, results are unbound.
Returns details of a single business type, selected by Id.
Returns details of all countries, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of countries, details can be retrieved by calling countries/{id}, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of countries, results are unbound.
Returns details of all countries, results are unbound.
Returns details of a single country, selected by Id.
Returns a basic list of establishments (id/name), details can be retrieved by calling establishments/{id}, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of establishments, details can be retrieved by calling establishments/{id}.
Returns a list of establishments, selected by Id.
Returns a details of a single establishment, selected by Id.
Returns a collection of establishment details, based on provided search parameters. All search parameters are optional.

parameters.description: Filter the results based on the Scheme Type (FHRS or FHIS) of the establishment (See SchemeTypes for more details). Valid options are 'FHRS' and 'FHIS'.
parameters.name: schemeTypeKey

parameters.description: Operator for increasing the flexibility of the rating search. Valid options are 'LessThanOrEqual', 'GreaterThanOrEqual' and 'Equal', the default for this value is 'Equal' (See RatingOperators for more details). Note: These operators only function on FHRS Ratings.
parameters.name: ratingOperatorKey

parameters.description: Set the options for sort field and direction of the results (See SortOptions for more details). Valid options are 'Relevance', 'rating', 'desc_rating', 'alpha', 'desc_alpha' and 'distance'
parameters.name: sortOptionKey

parameters.description: The page number of the result set to return.
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: Size of the page of results to return. (Note: Maximum value is system capped, so less results maybe returned than requested)
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: Filter the results based on the FHIS/FHRS Rating of the establishment (See Ratings for more details). Valid options for FHRS are '0', '1', '2', '3', '4' and '5' and for FHIS are 'Pass', 'ImprovementRequired', 'AwaitingPublication', 'AwatingInspection' and 'Exempt'
parameters.name: ratingKey

parameters.description: Terms to search for within the Business address and postcode of the establishments.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Terms to search for within the Business name of the establishments.
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: The longitude of the centre point of a spatial query.
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: The latitude of the centre point of a spatial query.
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: The max distance limit in miles from the centre of the spatial query. Note: This value maybe capped by the system to limit the size of the result set
parameters.name: maxDistanceLimit

parameters.description: Filter the results based on the Business Type of the establishment (See BusinessTypes for more details).
parameters.name: businessTypeId

parameters.description: Filter the results based on the Local Authority of the establishment (See Authorities for more details).
parameters.name: localAuthorityId

parameters.description: Filter the results based on the Country of the establishment (See Countries for more details).
parameters.name: countryId

get.summary: List Alerts | List alerts changed since some point in time | Search for alerts matching some search term

parameters.description: List alerts changed since some point in time (Example: 2018-01-29T16:25:08+00:00)
parameters.name: since

parameters.description: Search for alerts matching some search term (Example: tesco)
parameters.name: search

List of codes for allergens

List of hazard categories
List of reasons for alert
Returns details of all ratings, results are unbound.
Returns details of all RatingOperators, results are unbound.
Returns details of all regions, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of regions, details can be retrieved by calling regions{id}, page parameters allow for page number and size specification.
Returns a basic list of regions, details can be retrieved by calling regions{id}.
Returns details of all regions, results are unbound.
Returns details of a single region, selected by Id.
Returns details of all SchemeTypes, results are unbound.
Returns details of all scoreDescriptor, results are unbound
Returns details of all SortOptions, results are unbound.
